channel.title: references on erg home
channel.description: Recent content in references on erg home

item.description: There are several resources that have been published either by eg or in close collaboration with graduate students in Industrial and Organizational Psychology that all share a goal of furthering the advancement of organizational surveying. A partial listing of these resources (as well as hyperlinks to the resources themselves) is presented below: Organizational surveying resources ðŸ“š: Working with RMarkdown (GarcÃ­a Prieto Palacios Roji & Kulas, 2020) Working with GitHub (GarcÃ­a Prieto Palacios Roji et al.
